briefTitle: Feasibility of Total Mastectomy in Ambulatory Care
officialTitle: Feasibility of Total Mastectomy in Ambulatory Care
primaryOutcomeMeasure: number of ambulatory care after total mastectomy allowed with PADSS score
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patient with an indication of breast non conserving surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Standard contra-indication for ambulatory care.
* Also bilateral surgery and immediate breast reconstruction.
